Articles.Content:
False.

The next user would like ROFLCopter to stop talking about Bubsy.

False, I've never heard of it until now.

The user below me is using Linux.

False.

The user below me have at least tried Orbiter.

True. I've been playing Orbiter a while ago.

The next user plays or played both Orbiter and KSP.

True. I'm rather good a KSP but orbiter, well let's not talk about the dead guys.

The user below me understands basic rocket scince.

True.

The next user sucks at flying planes.

True, kinda have to to be a pilot

[EDIT]: Oh gawd, sniped in the most glorious way!!! XD False, I was with the 425th stationed in Bagotville, they only take the best

The user below me is a millimeter from completely flipping their #@%* at someone.

False, Humanity is safe for the moment

The user below me wants a postcard.

No thanks, but I can watch chobit-389's documented Postcard from Laythe. (To chobit-389: Your postcards are great.)

The next user is using Orbiter of one of the Dan's mod.

False?

The user below me is on a laptop.

True, and I play KSP on it.

The next user thinks that posts 305,306, and 307 constitute the most epic ninja ever.

False, because I don't get it.

The person below me is a gay fish.

False. I am not a fish nor am I happy.

The user below me is angry at chobit for not liking my humor

Also, for you people that never had a SNES, this is what bubsy is:

It was a third in the battle of Mario and Sonic, but until Accolade decided to let Bubsy 3D pass. Then the francise died. Just like that. If they didn't do that, then bubsy would still be around, and even have it's own TV show.

But until then, I dedicate my life to restarting the bubsy francise. Starting with the original.

False, I am laughing at/possibly with chobit for thing linked in sig.

The next user is a registered user of the KSP forum.

True.

The user below me hates the fact Bubsy died. And the fact that the possibility of a TV show died too.

False. Never cared for the bloody thing.

The user below me has a much better sense of humor then ROFL.

True. PARADOXES!

This sentence is false.

Does a set that contains all sets that does not contain iteslf contain itself?

New mission: Refuse this mission!
Uhm, True. I'll go true
The User Below Me Has Landed On Mun More Than Once.

Hehehehe

The user below me wanted a designer jumpsuit

False

The user below me don't know the word "Rakete"

Rattata?

I want a jumpsuit!

GLaDOS doesn't give out Aperture Science jumpsuits anymore!

The user below me is breathing and blinking manually.

N.... GAH, YOU MADE ME DO IT!

The user below me...

Is planning a Laythe colony and is NOT Chobit!

False. Already made one.

EDIT: Great, reminded myself of my previous question.

The user below me has exited Kerbol.

False, I could but there is nothing out there to see.

User below me has put a Kerman on every orbiting body.
